heroSection.subtitle: Hi! I am Kamila!
heroSection.text: I am a passionate and detail-oriented Frontend Developer with a solid foundation in HTML, CSS, SCSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, and React. I am highly motivated, resourceful, and committed to continuous self-improvement, with a strong ability to independently research and learn new technologies to deliver high-quality, user-focused solutions. I aim to contribute to innovative projects by delivering user-friendly and performant web applications while continuing to grow as a frontend developer.
